benchmark_details.name: WikiBio and ToTTo Benchmark for Table-to-Text Generation
benchmark_details.overview: This paper investigates the effectiveness of in-context learning strategies for table-to-text generation using the WikiBio and ToTTo datasets.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To comprehensively explore the performance of in-context learning in the table-to-text generation task.

data.size: Approx. 700,000 pairs of Wikipedia infoboxes and human-written descriptions; 120,000 examples in ToTTo.

methodology.calculation: BLEU score calculated by overlapping n-grams, BERTScore by using token embeddings for semantic similarity.
methodology.interpretation: Higher BLEU and BERT scores indicate better performance.
methodology.validation: Evaluated using various prompting strategies across the datasets.
